dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: By reconditioning the anima, you can redistribute the attribute points allocated to your weapon.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You may only recondition the anima of the weapon equipped when speaking with Ulan.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The process can be canceled at any time.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Recondition the anima of a different weapon.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Recondition the anima of your equipped weapon.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to recondition the anima of a weapon, you must first equip it, then speak with Ulan.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to recondition the anima of a weapon, you must first equip it, then speak with Ulan.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must equip your anima weapon before speaking with Ulan to proceed.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must equip both the Sword and Shield of the Twin Thegns before speaking with Ulan to proceed.

dialogue.name: ULAN
dialogue.text: Ardashir tells me you wish to alter the state of the anima, is that right?

dialogue.name: ULAN
dialogue.text: Assuming we do not attempt to push beyond its current limitations, this should be a trivial matter.

dialogue.name: ULAN
dialogue.text: Mind you, this process requires crystal sand. If you have none, I will gladly furnish you with more per our original arrangement.

dialogue.name: ULAN
dialogue.text: But you need not worry about umbrite. For this we require elementally aspected sand to ever so slightly alter the anima's aetherial composition.

dialogue.name: ULAN
dialogue.text: Unless you have any other questions, let us begin!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Recondition the anima.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Exchange items for crystal sand.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Ask about reconditioning.

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: Nothing.

dialogue.name: ULAN
dialogue.text: You appear to be out of crystal sand, my friend. If you would have more, then I must ask you bring me supplies in exchange.

dialogue.name: ULAN
dialogue.text: To carefully modify the anima's aetherial composition, we must make use of crystal sand once more. The process is quite different from our previous endeavor, but thankfully much simpler.

dialogue.name: ULAN
dialogue.text: Nevertheless, it still requires a fair amount of crystal sand. If you require more, you must supply me with materials in exchange. A deal is a deal, after all.

dialogue.name: ULAN
dialogue.text: Oh, and you need not bother with the umbrite. Stripping the sand of its elemental aspect would be counterproductive this time.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Conclude your business with Ulan?

dialogue.name: ULAN
dialogue.text: That went rather well, would you not agree? If you should have need of my services again, you have but to ask.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The anima has been transformed, gaining newfound strength!
